title: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322 - All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: The all types dialog displays obfuscated classes with equal prominence as non-obfuscated classes.
EB: Obfuscated classes should be displayed with less prominence compared to non-obfuscated classes.
SR: To fix this, there are two options: a) Sort lower case class names after the ones that start with a capital letter, or b) Completely filter out obfuscated classes. I suggest implementing option a).
